data.text: @DionneL35689211 @nzherald Lol don't be sorry I can't talk about My experience but I will say this covid is NOT what they are saying it is

@Hun85658406Hunt @nzherald Sorry you caught the dreaded covid. I have family in the UK who've lost other family members to it. 
I feel it's something we all have to get on with now & start living as normal as possible, however, it seems countries world wide are falling apart at seems & NZ is 1 of them too!
@mohitsgnr @nzherald @nzlabour @jacindaardern No more lockdown Bro..😉 how are you? Still remember me?😊
@nzherald No more lockdowns we've had enough already.
@nzherald Given in 2019, 2000 people over the age of 79 died each month(based on av for the year) there are bound to be people dying with omicron
